title: What are the positives and negatives of the product life cycle? - Quora

response.answer_text: Positives :  - Recursive cycle to accept any changes in the specifications.- Acceptance to any new idea which may not be the primary feature of the product.- Add/Remove features based on feedback- Feedback Cycle is important part of Product Development- Satisfaction of creating new things and innovation has easy access in the product development cycle.- New Features are implemented faster.- Reusability of code/component, without wasting time on creating the same thing again and again.- Many more ... Negatives : - Ever changing specifications sometimes create confusion in the versioning of product.- Small the product development team, better it is. Because in the fast and agile product development environment, keeping the large team in sync is difficult.- Need people with innovative ideas and work in odd hours.- Any methodology that works for service based application development does not work in product development cycle. Different type of product and team use different methodology based on their convenience, like Scrum, Agile or Extreme.- It is easy to miss deadlines in product development cycle because of the loose deadlines, as it is difficult to freeze on requirements and create a deadline.
